schema.description: Furniture JSON Schema for FloorplanStep - Interactive drag-and-drop with click-to-switch functionality

id.description: Unique identifier for the furniture item

type.description: Type of furniture from the furniture repository

image.description: URL link to the furniture image (can be PNG, JPG, SVG, etc.)

position.description: Position [x, y] coordinates in pixels on the floorplan

interactivity.pan_canvas: Click and drag the canvas background to pan around the floorplan
interactivity.zoom: Scroll to zoom in/out, or use the +/- buttons in the header. Zooms toward mouse position
interactivity.drag_furniture: Click and drag any furniture item to reposition it (must move >5px)
interactivity.click_to_switch: Click on a furniture item (without dragging) to open the sidebar and choose a replacement
interactivity.delete: Click the red X button on selected furniture or use the Delete Selected button
interactivity.add_furniture: Click '+ Add Furniture' button in the bottom-right corner

visual_feedback.selected: Selected furniture items have an orange (#E07B47) outline and show a red delete button
visual_feedback.dragging: Furniture being dragged has a blue (#4A7CFF) outline
visual_feedback.cursor_states: grab cursor for panning, grabbing while panning/dragging furniture

ui_layout.canvas_based: Floorplan now renders on HTML5 Canvas with full pan and zoom support
ui_layout.header: Zoom controls (+/-/Reset) and navigation buttons in the page header
ui_layout.bottom_right_button: Add Furniture button fixed in bottom-right corner
ui_layout.right_sidebar: Furniture selection sidebar slides in from the right when triggered

technical_details.pan_zoom: Smooth pan and zoom with proper coordinate space conversion
technical_details.drag_threshold: 5-pixel movement threshold to distinguish clicks from drags
